reviews.title: When your kids borrow your charger
reviews.review_text: My kids always want to "borrow" my charger, and they never seem to remember to give it back. This has saved me so much frustration. They don't ask to borrow it bc the phone has to be on it for the phone to charge. This little gadget allows me to charge all of my devices all at once and only requires one outlet.

great addition to my home. got this for the entry so i did not need to keep going to the bedroom to charge. So easy to charge everything quickly. Love the idea to have multiple mag charges around the house. friends love it when they come over , having a accessable charger!

OK, this little thing is so cute and functional and portable. Sometimes I forget to charge my Apple Watch at night and I would like to do it on the go because I don't like being without it this is small enough to fold up and put it in the side pocket of one of my purses. In the event of those emergencies. Bonus points because it can also charge my AirPods and my phone at the same time. I did find that I had to use a different USB cord than the one that came with it because it was not giving it enough power, but when I made that switch, it worked like a charm.
Charges iPhone, AirPods and Apple Watch slower than charging cables that comes with your devices. However it's a compacted and charges multiple devices. Overall a good buy

This charging unit is mediocre at best. My Apple Watch ultra too this charging unit is mediocre at best. My Apple Watch Ultra 2 charges inconsistently. As others have mentioned, the cell phone magnet is not strong enough to hold phones in the correct orientation works best when all items are laid flat charges inconsistently. As others have mentioned, the cell phone magnet is not strong enough to hold phones in the correct orientation works best when all charging pads are laid flat, which causes the watch charging pad to become inconsistent charging pads are laid flat, which causes the watch charging pad to become inconsistent

reviews.title: Meh….
reviews.review_text: This seemed to work ok for about 5 weeks- then started making this high pitched noise followed by the cord coming out of the end that goes into the charging block- leaving the metal end inside the charging block- it wasn't pulled on or anything just fell out. So now doesn't work at all. Don't recommend.

Awful. This makes a buzzing noise when plugged in. I bought it may 2 2025. By May 25 th it stopped working altogether and now my ear buds won't charge on any device charger. I believe it “fried” them!!! And where I purchased it says it is not elligible for return!!! Horrible. Experience!

reviews.title: Cooked Watch
reviews.review_text: Fire hazard. Claims to have an overheating protection but does not. Overheated my watch, melted the plastic on the charger, and it made burn marks where it was placed. Do not recommend if you use this unsupervised. Used maybe three times. Now I have a useless charger and a broken Apple Watch.

reviews.title: Go with a name brand
reviews.review_text: This was pretty low quality. The magnet didn't hold the phone on straight, and I'm pretty sure it was overcharging my phone and ruined my battery. After only two weeks of using it, my phone now needs to be charged twice as often. Doesn't really stand up very well.

reviews.title: High hopes, higher letdown.
reviews.review_text: It was great while it worked but it hasn't been even a month and all the wireless pads stop working. The led light on the side lights up but nothing charges. Place the phone on the mag safe nothing, the air pods pad nothing with the earbuds or anything else… save your money and get a regular pat safe puck.

I like the idea that you can carry one charger to charge all your devices. Makes it easier and much less hassle to carry. Great idea and great product. Saved me when I left me house without me charging gear. Thanks

reviews.title: Burning Smell
reviews.review_text: I bought 2 of these because, at first, I really liked it and wanted one to leave at my daughter's house. BOTH have since died and began to have a burning smell. Neither got much use as one was just for travel and the other for the few times I visited my daughter. Don't waste you money!

reviews.title: Nice charger, weak stand.
reviews.review_text: The watch charger won't hold the watch right so it's constantly “ reattaching “ itself %26 annoyingly making a noise. This is probably due to the angle I have it, but the stand isn't the best. You have to get it at just the right angle. The phone charger part is great, has a very strong magnet. Pretty good 3 in 1 charger perfect for taking with you. Would be 5 stars if the stand was improved.

reviews.title: Perfect Travel Companion for Apple Users
reviews.review_text: My wife exclusively uses Apple products (AirPods, iWatch, and iPhone), so whenever she travels for work, this charging station is all she needs for her devices. No more carrying around a tangle of cables! It's been working flawlessly, always ready for her to take on the go. The design is incredibly simple—no complicated manuals required—just a foldable, space-saving solution. I highly recommend this for anyone who travels frequently!

reviews.title: Space saver
reviews.review_text: My husband just got an Apple watch and was complaining about all of the charging cords. I saw this and figured it'd be perfect for him. He set it up on his nightstand and charges his items overnight. It saves a lot of space and his devices are fully charged when he wakes up.

reviews.title: Great gadget
reviews.review_text: I love this little thing. It's small and fits perfectly in my work backpack. I allows me to stop carrying 87 different cables and folds it all into one simple device. Definitely worth the money. I can charge all at once.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I love how compact and easy to travel with this charger is. If it's easily into my purse or carry-on, and it looks great on the side table with everything organized and charging in one place. I can just wake up in the morning grab everything I need from one spot and go.

reviews.title: So convenient!
reviews.review_text: I love this for all our Apple products! It cuts down on cords (only need one for 3 devices) and your devices are all in the same place. It folds down very compact to make it easy for travel. And it also charges just as fast as our Apple brand chargers.

reviews.title: All about apple
reviews.review_text: One grand has all apple items, so when we saw this we figured it would help cut down on plug ins needed for all her electronics, it is working out great. She puts it on her night stand and the next morning everything is ready to go. IT came with good instructions and is very easy to set up. great product.

reviews.title: 3 in 1
reviews.review_text: This product is great. I can easily charge all of my devices with one plug instead of 3. I like that on my phone it continues to display the time, so when I wake up I can see the time. It doesn't take up a lot of space either. I'm very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.title: All in one
reviews.review_text: The 3-in-1 MagSafe Charger has been a lifesaver for my nightstand setup. It charges my iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods all at once, which has really helped me keep things organized and free from the clutter of multiple cables. The magnetic hold for the iPhone is strong, and it aligns perfectly every time, so I never have to worry about it slipping out of place. The gray color looks sleek and modern, and it blends well with my other devices. The charging speed is impressive—it's just as fast as using my standard chargers, so there's no compromise there. I especially like the convenience of being able to just set my devices down, and they start charging immediately. Overall, this is a fantastic charger for anyone looking to simplify their setup with a single, stylish charging station.

reviews.title: Innovative, Yet Simple
reviews.review_text: I prefer wireless chargers. Usually, when needing to charge more than one thing on a wireless charger, they are either a large pad or a bulky shape. Neither is good for on the go or traveling. This wireless charger solves that problem with added benefits. I can open it and make it completely flat to charge everything or I can configure it to where it charges my phone (and the rest) in a stand form. That is a great feature. Also, it folds up to this little square that can easily go in my purse, bag, or suitcase. It does not take up much room at all. It charges my devices quickly. I would say it's one of the most innovative, yet seemly obvious designs for a wireless charger I have come across.

reviews.title: Feels cheap
reviews.review_text: It works great, but the stand is so flimsy my phone keeps falling over with all my parts with my watch and AirPods and then they come detached from the magnet charge and end up, not charging through the night because they become disconnected. Definitely feels cheap.

Best way to charge your devices, no cables! Highly recommend for traveling as it saves so much space. I always leave mine on my nightstand and simply put all my devices on it before bed. Easy to use, charges devices fast. Can't beat it for the price.

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.review_text: super convenient and works great. love being able to charge all my devices at once and not have to have a ton of cords everywhere. i put them on at night %26 they are fully charged by the morning. nothing super fancy about it but it works like it should

reviews.title: Reduce plugs and cords in the bedroom!
reviews.review_text: Love the convenience of the 3-in-1 MagSafe Charger! It keeps my iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods all in one spot, reducing clutter and charging them efficiently. The gray finish is sleek and fits perfectly with my desk setup. Plus, the magnetic alignment is strong, so my phone stays in place while charging. Highly recommend for anyone looking for an all-in-one charging solution!

reviews.title: Convenient!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the convenience of being able to charge everything at once. I used this the first night I got it and it charges everything super fast and doesn't heat up my devices. This will be perfect for upcoming vacations to avoid bringing several chargers.

reviews.title: Sleek %26 Smart
reviews.review_text: A sleek, all-in-one charger for iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods. Strong magnetic alignment, fast charging, and a clean gray design make it perfect for keeping your setup organized and hassle-free. Ideal for Apple users seeking convenience and style.

reviews.title: Not great, not terrible
reviews.review_text: Eh. I know these types of products are a hit or miss, and they're made cheaply, but I at least expected every aspect to work. It's supposed to charge an iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods at the same time. It only charged my AirPods if I spent like 15 seconds trying to set them in the perfect spot on the pad. It was difficult to get them to wirelessly charge. Was fine with charging my watch, and charged my phone if I removed the case. Which is a hassle but I'm aware wireless chargers don't always work through thick cases. Okay product.

reviews.title: Efficient and space saving
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I bought this charging station. It fits perfectly on my nightstand by the bed so I can conveniently charge all of my devices at night while I sleep. I was able to remove the outlet adapter from my outlet since this only uses 1 cord to charge all of my devices. Great space saving/outlet saving device!

reviews.title: Amazing charger
reviews.review_text: Amazing 3 in 1 MagSafe charger which charges 3 devices at the same time with full speed. It is a nice and very convenient to carry this tiny little charger that charges all of my devices like iPhone, apple watch, and AirPods all at the same time. Highly recommend it as it's very easy for travel as well.

reviews.title: Really nice charger
reviews.review_text: This 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charger is really nice. It arrived quickly and nicely packaged. It's powered using type C charger, and came with the wall block, which is a plus. Folded out, it doesn't take up much space, but it folds up to take up even less space when not in use. Decent price for this charger.

reviews.title: Easy charging of all my devices
reviews.review_text: This charger is so easy to use and set up. One cord to plug in, and all my devices can be just set on it to charge. It makes it so much easier to charge because they're all in one place and I don't have to find cords for everything. I'll definitely be getting another for my husband so he keeps his hands of mine.

reviews.title: So handy
reviews.review_text: This is so great for charging all of my Apple products at the same time. It's small enough to travel with but sturdy and cute enough to leave out on a counter or bedside table daily. I'd definitely recommend to anyone who has multiple Apple products.

reviews.title: Effortless Power %26 Organization
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Bluestone 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charger for a few weeks now, and I couldn't be happier with the experience! This charger has truly transformed my daily routine by allowing me to power up my smartphone, Apple Watch, and AirPods all at once without the hassle of tangled cords. The sleek, ultra-thin folding design not only looks modern and stylish but also saves precious space on my desk and nightstand. The 15w super-fast charging for my phone is impressive, and knowing that it intelligently manages the charging speeds for my watch (2.5w) and AirPods (3.5w) gives me peace of mind. I love the magnetic closure and built-in kickstand, which add both functionality and a touch of sophistication to the unit. Plus, the non-slip base and overheat protection ensure that the charger remains safe and secure during use. The fact that it comes complete with a Type-C cable and a 20W PD charger is the icing on the cake. Whether I'm at home, in the office, or on the go, this charger is the ultimate accessory to keep all my essential devices powered and organized. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to simplify their tech setup without sacrificing performance!

reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
reviews.review_text: Really convenient having this rather than separate chargers. The design was pretty nice, very easy to use and so far so good. I've used it almost a month now and have had no problems so I'm pretty confident this will last me awhile. Don't see anything going wrong with it.

reviews.title: It's a MUST for my Travel Bag!
reviews.review_text: If you're anything like me, remembering to grab ALL the chargers before a trip, or even worst, when you're packing up to come home, can be a struggle. I can't tell you how many chargers I've gifted to hotels and Airbnbs over the years. Not any more!!! This charger folds up to fit in the palm of your hand and could easily slide into your pocket. I will say, it's not super fast, so it works best charging over night. I have slipped it into my pocket on the way out of the door after some last minute charging though!

reviews.title: So convenient, lightweight, and affordable!
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Bluestone 3-in-1 Charger for my husband, who travels frequently for work, and it has been a total game-changer for him. Before this, he was constantly packing (and misplacing) multiple charging cables for his phone, smartwatch, and earbuds. Now, with this all-in-one charger, he only needs to bring one device to charge everything, which has made his packing routine much more convenient. The ultra-thin folding design is perfect for travel—it folds compactly, takes up very little space in his bag, and even has a magnetic closure to keep it neatly folded. He also loves the built-in kickstand, which allows him to prop up his phone while it charges. The 15W super-fast wireless charging works efficiently, and he hasn't noticed any overheating issues, thanks to the overheat protection feature. Another big plus is that it comes with a Type-C cable and a 20W PD charger, so he didn't have to buy anything extra. The non-slip base ensures that it stays in place on his nightstand or hotel desk. Overall, this charger has been an excellent investment—it reduces clutter, keeps all his devices charged, and is perfect for travel or everyday use. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Not worth the money
reviews.review_text: Worked for 1 week then started glowing orange and I threw it away because I was afraid it would catch fire!

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: Works great on my phone I love it! Definitely glad I decided to buy this instead of going to Apple and buying a MagSafe charger

reviews.title: Fire hazard
reviews.review_text: After a day of being plugged it, it over heated, smelled terribly and actually melted the watch charger closed.
Product was terrible. Watch kept falling off. Phone kept falling off. Charger got hot. Skip this charger. You get what you pay for!!

reviews.title: Unstable, Won't Hold Phone
reviews.review_text: Stand is poorly designed so the kickstand part cant stay in place when a phone is trying to charge. Just falls down.

reviews.title: Recommended only if you don't have an option
reviews.review_text: The stability of stand is not very good. Loose ball joint. Also, phone gets heat up very quickly when using this charger.
It's perfect. It's unbeatable for the price. Everything works perfect it arrived quickly. I'm more than happy with. It may order another one.
Stopped charging my phone after a little over a month. Unfortunately the return window is only 30 days. I do not recommend at all.
Hard to balance with all of the electronics attached. I wasn't able to get all three on and charging at once.

reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
reviews.review_text: Does not charge half of the time with no warning and beeps really annoyingly when your phone is not on it. DO NOT BUY!!!

reviews.title: This is the best!
reviews.review_text: I love this thing. It's handy. Travels well and isn't bulky at all. I take it with when I travel for work and it's compact enough to fit in my purse. Greatest find ever!

reviews.title: So far, so good!
reviews.review_text: Handy and compact. I was out of town and forgot my charging devices. I looked online for something simple, compact, and affordable when I found this product. I now use this instead of my other charging devices. So far, so good!

reviews.title: Portable Power…
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised how portable and fast charging this device is. No more extra cables ,this slim design allows you to throw it in your pocket and go! Will be purchasing more to gift!

reviews.title: Great for traveling
reviews.review_text: Great for traveling. It folds up in a compact square and is lightweight. So convenient to be able to charge everything on vacation - and it charges quickly! I don't leave home without it!

reviews.title: Will burn your house
reviews.review_text: The charger stopped charging the day after the return window expired. And it started smelling like burnt plastic. Had to disconnect it to avoid a fire.

reviews.title: not recommend
reviews.review_text: item does not stick to the back of the screen / hold the weight of the phone. the whole thing falls of with the phone

reviews.title: doesn't work for android watch
reviews.review_text: read the description well before ordering. I didn't. works great for android phone but not for watches etc. oops.

reviews.title: No more cords
reviews.review_text: I love this charger. I have it set up next to my bad and I'm able to charge all my devices at once and charging my phone is the best part, it magnetized to the stand and don't have to worry with any cords

reviews.title: Organized and versatile
reviews.review_text: I love this charging station! it is so useful to charge my phone, apple watch, and apple airpods all at the same time. It also looks nice and organized without all the charging cables.

reviews.title: Perfect to reduce cords
reviews.review_text: I got tired of trying to keep charging cords from slipping behind my nightstand. This is perfect because it is heavy enough it doesn't slide around and I'm able to charge both my watch and phone (no earbuds, but it folds up)

reviews.title: useful and convenient
reviews.review_text: purchased to use on a new phone. works great for the samsung 25 ultra. multiple setup/layout options for the charger to charge multiple devices makes it extremely convenient and useful

reviews.title: Killer 3 in 1
reviews.review_text: Omg this is what I have been looking for! Great for travel take only one thing no longer have to carry so many chargers for all my Apple products. Love that it can stand so you can have it in your nightstand or lays flat.

reviews.title: Kitchen charger
reviews.review_text: I use this as a master charging station in my kitchen for when we just need a bit more charge to get through the rest of the day and it has been working great.

reviews.title: Charging port
reviews.review_text: The charging part port for your watch doesn't seem to want to stay on and it doesn't totally lift up. It's angled down so that's why it slides off not made very well.

reviews.title: Easy to travel with
reviews.review_text: I bought this for traveling so I didn't have to carry 3 cables. Works great and charges all 3 of my devices simultaneously. Easy to carry in my purse.

reviews.title: Extremely convinient
reviews.review_text: Extremely convinient, this 3 in 1 charger is super compact. It makes charging all my devices at night a very easy task to do. It also helps keeping all of them in one spot and only one outlet needed.

reviews.title: Great charger for home or travel
reviews.review_text: This has been a great charger! It folds up small and is perfect for traveling! I've also love using it everyday and that it easily charges all of my devices at once with one cable.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review_text: I love how easy this is to use and it works great. Just plug it in and start charging your devices. Made of good quality and seems to be very durable. Thank you for a great product at a great price.

reviews.title: Combo charger
reviews.review_text: I like that I can charge my phone and AirPods at the same time without having to use a separate charger. Also packs easy which also means I don't have to take two different charges with me on a trip.

reviews.title: Great charger for everything you need charged.
reviews.review_text: This charger works great for everything g that I need to charge every night. It doesn't take up too much room in my night stand and it is nice and sturdy. Charges quickly and so easy to use.

reviews.title: works great
reviews.review_text: great charging pad, especially for when Im travelling! I love how compact it is when it is closed. Easy to store and fit in my backpack. The pad is easy to set up, and does a great job at rapid charging my devices. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Charges quickly!
reviews.review_text: I've tried a few of these from other brands, but this one is by far the best. Every part of the charging system works great! It's sturdy and holds my devices well. It charges quickly. Definitely recommend this product.

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.review_text: I'm enjoying the convenience of my 3 in one charger. I'm able to charge my phone, Apple Watch and AirPods at the same time. My items charge super fast.

reviews.title: Easy and convenient
reviews.review_text: So much easier have one charger for several items and way less cords making a mess. I really like the way the various charging ports are set up. It doesn't take up a lot of room on the nightstand. One more problem solved.

reviews.title: You should have this
reviews.review_text: Why did I wait so long to get this? It is so useful to be able to charge everything at once. I love the ease of charging my cell phone by just placing it on the charger. I think this will make a great gift for pretty much everyone I know.

reviews.title: Space Saver
reviews.review_text: I love that I can charge all of my devices on one station! This is great to eliminate all the excess cords %26 space. It works great on all my devices, watch, phone, etc.

reviews.title: Charges quickly
reviews.review_text: This is great! I have it beside my bed and I'm able to charge all my devices at once with no wires all in one place. It charges them quickly and doesn't take up much space.

reviews.title: Super easy to use
reviews.review_text: This does a great job of charging several things at once! It's attractive and works out of the box, very intuitive design and easy to use. If you're an Apple product user, this is a must.

reviews.title: Great travel charger
reviews.review_text: Perfect size for traveling. Have been using this instead of bringing multiple cords. Small enough when folded up that it takes up almost no room. Charging speeds all seem good - even when charging multiple items.

reviews.title: 3 in 1 MagSafe charger for Apple
reviews.review_text: This 3 in 1 MagSafe charger is a game changer it charges all my devices like my iPhone, watch and AirPods at once the charge is super fast it's less clutter it's nice and simple it is a perfect gift

reviews.title: Genies tool
reviews.review_text: This charger is genies! I can charge everything at once and it works so well! Charges quickly and only takes one plug. Great for Travel as well so I don't have to bring 3 chargers. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Convenient 3 in 1 wireless charger
reviews.review_text: A great looking 3 in 1 wireless charger for my iPhone, AppleWatch, and Airpods. It charges everything super fast and doesn't take too much space nor require all the cords I would use for all three devices. I'm super happy with it!

reviews.title: Handy!
reviews.review_text: This is the handiest tool! It works incredibly well to charge all 3 devices at once if I need to. I love having that option! So innovative. Great value for the money too!

reviews.title: iPhone and Apple Watch charger
reviews.review_text: It charges great for the value but if you leave it plugged into the wall while not charging and item it sends a beeping annoying sound! Other than that it's great!

reviews.title: ONE plug in, makes charging so much easier!
reviews.review_text: Works as it should, makes charging my things easier than it has ever been! I used to keep a charger plugged in for each thing. Now I have this on my stand and only having to use one plug! Easy to use and works as it should

Picked up today tried for an hour to charge watch but would not charge it even a little, put it on at 94% and it stayed there, put back on regular charger and charged it to 100% in 2 minutes, it wouldn't even charge 1% in 60 minutes so returning it.

reviews.title: Perfect-Simultaneous Charging All in One Place
reviews.review_text: This is a great little charging station. It makes it so easy to have all of my items in the same place so they are always charged and I am always able to find them. Works with all of my Apple devices!

reviews.title: All-in-one charger!
reviews.review_text: This thing is awesome! I'm able to charge my phone, airpods and apple watch at the same time. It charges quickly and is also a great stand for watching videos on my phone. No complaints at all.

great compact charger! I was hoping it would charge my Google watch, but unfortunately it does not. it does charge android phones though! so i will use it for my work phone (apple) and my personal phone. I love that I can just drop and charge.

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.review_text: This wireless charger is such a convenient way to charge my phone, Apple Watch, and AirPods all at once. The foldable design makes it super easy to take on the go, and the magnetic closure keeps everything neat! Works great!

reviews.title: Perfect all in one charging solution
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this 3-in-1 MagSafe charger! It's super convenient to charge my iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods all at once without needing separate cables or outlets. The magnetic alignment for my phone is perfect, and it charges everything quickly. The sleek, compact design also saves a lot of space on my nightstand. I no longer have to deal with tangled cords, and the build quality feels premium. If you're looking for an efficient and stylish all-in-one charging solution, this is definitely worth it!
My daughter stole my charger so I needed a new one.

reviews.title: Looks well, Doesn't function very well
reviews.review_text: I was very excited for this product as it looked portable, as well as a nice addition to my besides table. It has many issues though, some kind of scary. The charging dock itself looks nice and functions. The watch charger will start and stop charging and frequently won't charge my Apple Watch to 100%. I have tried it with my husbands Apple Watch with the same results. Now the scary part. The charging block that came with the dock makes many weird noises, it makes some weird beeping noises that I can't really explain. I'm afraid that it might be a safety hazard and don't want the block to cause a fire. I have discontinued use but cannot return. It's very unfortunate.

Flimsy, too lightweight, wouldn't stay upright. It took all afternoon into the night to charge my Apple Watch. It might be ok for travel, but don't waste your time and money. I returned it for a regular smart watch cord charger that was half the price and actually charged my watch. Either stick with the traditional charger or spend the extra ten dollars for the stand.

reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
reviews.review_text: Wasted my money and couldn't even get a refund because by the time I opened it and realized it wasn't working, the item was no longer eligible for refund. It would connect like it was going to charge then it would stop charging, it would switch back and forth between charging and not charging which caused my phone and AirPods to die faster from all the switching back and forth.

reviews.title: Beeping or buzzing. Doesn't seem safe
reviews.review_text: Makes a beeping or buzzing sound when plugged in. Not sure if it's the chord or the wall plug itself. Won't be using anymore, afraid it might cause a fire or might fry my devices.

reviews.title: Get it together Bluestone.
reviews.review_text: So this is not the first one I've bought. The very first one I bought would not charge my phone or AirPods but would charge my watch. This one that I recently bought will charge my phone and AirPods but will not charge my watch. After reading other reviews turns out the watch issue is common. Please bluestone get it together.

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.review_text: Makes a weird buzzing sound that kept waking me up in the middle of the night. Charges really slow when you have the watch and iPhone on it.

reviews.title: Phone charge good, watch not
reviews.review_text: Magnet for Apple Watch did not hold very well, charging inconsistent and unreliable, constantly going on and off. I returned it.

reviews.title: Do not recommend
reviews.review_text: It sucks, the Apple Watch charges for like a minute (very ve ru slow btw) and then it stops Charges phone extremely slow too

reviews.title: Neat but not worth it
reviews.review_text: Neat and compact but doesn't charge well. MagSafe clips well but with or without case (MagSafe case) leaves the phone not fully charged. Very disappointed as I had high hopes for the product.

reviews.title: Fire hazard
reviews.review_text: The charger melted and caught fire after three days of use.
